pages.text: Potions are handy. Carrying half an inventory of them around, however, is more than a little inconvenient.$(br)The Potion Pendant has a small chamber that can be filled with the effect of a potion. As long as you wear it, you will receive the effects of that potion.$(br)Since the potions are not ingested, the effects will only last up to level III.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Use the $(l:brewing/potion_workshop)Potion Workshop$(/l) to infuse it, by placing it where the $(item)Bottle$() would normally go.$(br2)To clear its effect, put it in a crafting grid.
